original_text: Jesus himself knew that the disciples did not like his message. He did not need anyone to tell him. He said to them, ‘This seems to make you angry.
korean_text: 예수께서 스스로 제자들이 이 말씀에 대하여 수군거리는 줄 아시고 이르시되 이 말이 너희에게 걸림이 되느냐

sentences.original_text: that the disciples did not like his message
sentences.korean_translation: 제자들이 그의 메시지를 좋아하지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: He did not need anyone to tell him
This seems to make you angry
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희를 화나게 하는 것 같구나
